# 📐 variables.css

Defines spacing scale, font scale (modular), and shadow presets.

## ✅ Included

- Font scale: `--ms-sm` → `--ms-xxxl` using modular scale
- Spacing units: `--space-0` → `--space-5`
- Shadow tokens: `--shadow-sm`, `--shadow-md`, `--shadow-lg`

## 📁 Location

`css/theme/variables.css`
